TextLibrary.Text: You look like you just finished school, kid.
You look like you just finished school, kid.
I'm a full graduate of the MRI Corporation Academy. Is there a problem?
I'm a full graduate of the MRI Corporation Academy. Is there a problem?
Cool it, kid. I'm just messin' with you. If you can chase these Pirates back to Quaris where they came from, I couldn't care less if you were a Jahrwoxi's kidneystone.
Cool it, kid. I'm just messin' with you. If you can chase these Pirates back to Quaris where they came from, I couldn't care less if you were a Jahrwoxi's kidneystone.

Don't worry, kid. Listen, the Pirates've been stealin' our minerals and alloys from the asteroids. Last week they mounted a raid on our shipyard and stole a freighter! I need you to patrol 4 points 'round the system - the shipyard and our 3 biggest asteroids - and see if there's any sign of Pirates. Got it?

I need you to patrol 4 points 'round the system - the shipyard and our 3 biggest asteroids - and see if there's any sign of Pirates. Got it?
